channel.title: The Mindful Parameter
channel.description: Recent content on The Mindful Parameter

item.title: Welcome!
item.description:
Hi, I am a hobbyist AI Research Engineer.

Welcome to my blog.

At the intersection of technical precision and ethical responsibility lies impactful work. The Mindful Parameter explores how small adjustments in AI systems create rippling effects across society.

Here, I document my journey toward alignment - carefully tuning each parameter with awareness of its downstream implications. Parameters (weights & biases) are fundamental to how AI systems function - they encode what the system has learned and dictate its behavior.
